DOC.brief_summary: This is a first-in-man study for the purpose of determining the safety and tolerability of LX214 ophthalmic solution in healthy volunteers and in patients with dry eye syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Escalation Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of LX214 Ophthalmic Solution in Healthy Volunteers, Followed by an Open-Label Evaluation of LX214 in Patients With Keratoconjunctivitis Sicca (KCS)
